belongs_to_collection.name: How I Unleashed World War II

original_title: Jak rozpętałem drugą wojnę światową: Cz. 1 - Ucieczka
overview: On the night of August 31, 1939, Dolas, from a platoon reinforcing a train station on the German border, falls asleep in a train car and unknowingly crosses into Germany. The moment he shoots a German, who he thinks is a saboteur, the German invasion of Poland begins, and Dolas is convinced it was his fault. He is taken to Stalag POW camp, the first destination in his odyssey around Europe.
title: How I Unleashed World War II, Part I: The Escape
